cbinstall.name: CB User Menu
cbinstall.author: Chris Michaelides
cbinstall.description: This plugin will display user's custom menu.

param.name: usernames
param.label: Real Name or Username?
param.description: Choose what should be displyed an the user's name

param.name: shownames
param.label: Show Name?
param.description: Choose if the user's name should be displayed

param.name: showonline
param.label: Show Online Status?
param.description: Choose if you want the online/offline icon to be displayed

param.name: showicons
param.label: Show Icon Links?
param.description: Choose if you want the icon links to be displayed

param.name: showtext
param.label: Show Text Links?
param.description: Choose if you want the text links to be displayed
